name: Spot the Icon
description:
In this Icons puzzle game you have to find and spot the specific required Icon pictures in Icons matrix.
But hurry up- you must spot the Icon before time limit runs out or you will lose !

you can play this game in levels- level by level,
or in classic mode in witch you must spot as many Icons as you can.

Play with hundreds of Icon pictures !



Background music created by Žilvinas Kalašinskas
Icons provided by:
google,
www.1001FreeDownloads.com,
www.graphicloads.com,
www.iconsmind.com
